Description: Two joining fragments of the rim and neck of a Wild Goat Style pottery amphora with geometric patterns and bands in black glaze.
Curator's comments: Cook CVA 57: "Fragment of a very big amphora (?). Diam. of lip about 0,205 m. Clay fired pinkish; cream slip".
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (p. 57, II. 3 Abb 4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 99)
